sect1.title: Internal Component Design
sect1.para: The component is splitted into two files. CentrActivationNetDiag - Handles Activation or deactivation of Network Diagnosis based the Flag set. ConfigCentrActivationNetDiag - Configuration file for Central Network Diagnosis Flag

sect1.title: Requirements Allocation
sect1.para: The component covers requirement present in the module 5.SWR_ICAS1_BSW. The requirements present in chapter 2.18.2 Network Diagnostics is covered by this component. The Requirements traceability in SWA can be found in EA in the following location: VW_ICAS1.Chorus_6M.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ServiceLayer.DiagServices.Diagnstoics.SW Architecture.Components.Network Diagnosis Flag.Requirements traceability

sect1.title: Software Unit Interfaces
sect1.para: Network Diagnosis Flag has two SW components ,but there is no interaction between them.

sect1.title: Software Unit Interaction
sect1.para: Network Diagnosis Flag has two SW components ,but there is no interaction between them.

sect1.title: Dynamic Behavior
sect1.para: see also Interaction Diagram "Network diagnostic flag" at the following location in Enterprise Architect: VW_ICAS1.Chorus_6M.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ServiceLayer.DiagServices.Diagnosis.SW Architecture.Components.NetworkDiagnosticFlag.Dynamic Diagrams Interrupts
There is no interrupts directly handled by Network Diagnosis Flag. Events
There are no cyclic Events executed in Network Diagnosis Flag Operating Modes
There are no special operating modes.
There is no special power modes used.
A special exception or error handling is not necessary. Synchronization
A special synchronization method is not necessary. Operations
The operations are mentioned in the proper function description.

sect1.title: Evaluate Software Detailed Design
sect1.para: The subcomponent has defined interfaces that can be easy accessed from different modules. The design of this subcomponent was created with testablity in mind. Proposed solutions can be tested by unit tests with 100% MC/DC coverage.
